price: Rwose, wowe (Muhamadi) ntuyobora uwo ukunze, ahubwo Allah ni We uyobora uwo ashaka. Kandi ni We uzi neza abayobotse.
arabic: إِنَّكَ لَا تَهۡدِي مَنۡ أَحۡبَبۡتَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innaka lā tahdī man aḥbabta walākinna al-laha yahdī man yashāu wahuwa aʿlamu bil-muh'tadīna
